name: ergonomic office chair green friendly all recyclable parts custom fit
description:
Ergonomic Chair office chairs custom fit all different size seats,backs etc. Made to fit all.
1.audiable pneumatic back 7 height adjustments
2.seat slidder
3.adjustable arms up-down, and 360 dgree rotation of gel arm pads
4.adjustable seat angle
5.pneumatic piston for height adjustment
6.Indulgent memory foam available(upcharge)
7.waterfall seat, deep seat, or moderate seat contour
8.cervical headrest available(upcharge)
9.stretch knit dreamwewave fabric, or vinyl available. leather available(upcharge)
